response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe is an excellent match for your needs and expectations. Given its value to you, I propose a special introductory offer of $11,500 for this exceptional item. I look forward to hearing your response and the chance to assist you with your purchase. Kind regards, Alice", "product_price": 11500}
